title: Luka on Harrison firing: Just focused on Lakers

title: Greenpeace report on shipwreck seeks to fix liability on MSC
content: Report exposes how the shipping company has systematically expanded its operations using ageing vessels and exploiting regulatory loopholes and flag-of- convenience practices, causing  environmental disasters in South Asia

title: Air India's Toronto-Delhi Flight Gets Bomb Threat, 2nd In 24 Hours
content: Authorities on Thursday received a bomb threat message for an Air India flight when it was flying from Toronto to Delhi, and later, the flight landed safely in the national capital, according to sources.

content: The detention of Dr Mohammad Arif, a senior resident doctor in the Cardiology department at the LPS Institute of Cardiology & Cardiac Surgery in Kanpur, in connection with the Delhi blast case, has shocked his acquaintances.

title: Woman, 38, Stressed Over Her Teen's Phone Addiction, Dies By Suicide In UP
content: A 38-year-old woman here allegedly committed suicide after being distressed over her teenage son's growing addiction to smartphones, police said on Thursday.

title: Video: Robbers Waltz Into Jewellery Store With Swords, Gun, Pick It Clean
content: In a late-night break-in, four unidentified men waltzed into a jewellery shop in Maharashtras Tisangi village and fled with items worth nearly Rs 7 lakh.

title: 'Bad For Skin': Japan Prime Minister Takaichi Says She Sleeps Only 2-4 Hours
content: Japanese Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi said on Thursday she only sleeps for between two and four hours every night, while she also faces criticism for encouraging people to overwork.

title: European Union Probes Google Over Search Results Despite Trump Threats
content: The EU launched a fresh investigation into Google on Thursday over suspicions the US giant is pushing down news outlets in search results, despite retaliation threats from US President Donald Trump.

title: 15 Arrested In Assam For Social Media Posts Linked To Delhi Car Blast
content: Assam Police has arrested 15 people from different districts for allegedly posting objectionable and inflammatory on social media after the Monday's car blast in Delhi, which killed 13 people.

title: Video: Leopard Attacks Safari Vehicle In Karnataka, Injures 1
content: A regular safari at the Bannerghatta National Park in Karnataka on Thursday turned into a terrifying experience for tourists when a leopard tried to enter a vehicle and injured a person in the process.

title: Why Nepal's Banknotes Now Come From China, Not India
content: Nepal Rastra Bank (NRB), the central bank of the country, sent a letter of intent to China Banknote Printing and Minting Corporation (CBPMC) on Friday to design, print and supply 430 million pieces of Nepal's Rs 1,000 denomination banknotes.

title: New CCTV Footage Adds A Twist In Andhra Bus Fire Probe

title: Bangladesh To Hold Referendum Along With Elections In February
content: In a move that is likely to see opposition in Bangladesh, the Chief Advisor of the Interim Government of Bangladesh, Muhammad Yunus, has announced a referendum along with elections in Bangladesh in February next year.

title: Politics Overtakes Red Fort Blast, Congress vs BJP Over P Chidambaram's Comment

title: When Relationship Coaches Fight: Woman Says Husband Hit Her With Set-Top Box

content: Chirag Paswan, also a Union Minister in the Narendra Modi-led NDA government, is eyeing at least 40 seats for his Lok Janshakti Party (LJP) in the forthcoming Bihar polls.

title: Materials Used To Produce Toxin Ricin Found At Doctor's House In Hyderabad

title: Kanahiya Kumar: The Man Who Has Seen It All From Bihar To Tihar

title: Rabri Devi: Bihar's Only Woman Chief Minister Who Got There Accidentally

title: Cabinet decisions on exports to improve competitiveness: PM Modi
content: Union Cabinet, at a meeting chaired by Mr. Modi on November 12, 2025, approved the export promotion mission and a credit guarantee scheme for exporters

title: From pier to pixel: Campaigns for Kerala local body elections get a digital makeover
content: Hiring professional photographers and content strategists, candidates are exploring digital tools to drum up their campaign on social media to attract young voters

title: Muslim League to leverage Kerala local body polls as launch pad for 2026 Assembly election
content: Party has already secured seat-sharing agreements with its United Democratic Front allies in most of the 1,999 local bodies. Negotiations are still under way in a few local bodies. According to party State general secretary P.M.A. Salam, a final agreement is expected within a day or two

title: Hyderabad: Traffic diversions in Aramghar due to ongoing road repairs
content: Aramghar is the key junction on the Hyderabad-Bengaluru Highway and connects the east-west corridor in the southern part of Hyderabad

title: 'B'desh-like uprising': RJD leader's shock remark on eve of Bihar poll results; FIR filed
content: Ahead of Bihar election results, RJD leader Sunil Singh was booked for an "inflammatory" remark, warning of Nepal-like unrest if candidates were "made to lose." This comes as exit polls predict a win for the NDA, with projections showing the Mahagathbandhan falling short of a majority. Police are on alert to prevent any untoward incidents.

title: 'Age trolls': Vaibhav Suryavanshi's two-word response goes viral - watch
content: Teenage sensation Vaibhav Suryavanshi, one of the youngest prodigies in Indian cricket, was the subject of light-hearted banter from older teammates Yudhvir Singh Charak and Gurjapneet Singh ahead of the ACC T20 Emerging Teams Asia Cup. The viral video captured the players teasing the 14-year-old about his age and hairstyle as the India A squad traveled to Doha.

title: '32 vehicles with explosives': Agencies uncover chilling plot; details of Delhi blast case
content: Intelligence agencies have uncovered a wider terror plot linked to the Delhi Red Fort car explosion, revealing plans to rig 32 vehicles for coordinated attacks across multiple cities. Investigations revealed suspects were modifying vehicles and preparing to execute serial blasts with multiple IEDs, with eight suspects working in pairs assigned to specific cities.

title: Crypto shift: World's largest Bitcoin exchange Coinbase follows Elon Musk's warning; says move 'not made lightly'
content: Coinbase, a major Bitcoin exchange, is moving its incorporation from Delaware to Texas. The company cited concerns about unpredictable legal outcomes in Delaware. Texas offers a more innovation-friendly environment. Other prominent tech and finance firms have also recently relocated from Delaware. This move signals a shift in corporate reincorporation trends.

title: ‘Supporting terrorists’: BJP flays Chidambaram; slams ‘homegrown terror’ remark
content: The Bharatiya Janata Party has strongly criticized Congress leader P Chidambaram for his comments on homegrown terrorists. Union minister Giriraj Singh accused Chidambaram of supporting terrorists and appeasement politics. BJP MP Praveen Khandelwal stated that terrorists have no religion and questioned Chidambaram's past actions. National spokesperson Nalin Kohli alleged Chidambaram is building a political narrative.

title: 'Dog that hasn't barked': Do new Epstein files exonerate Trump?
content: At first glance it looked explosive. But the closer the messages were read, the more they collapsed under their own weight. No accusation was made. No crime was alleged. No victim testimony was cited. The only thing that barked was political theatre.

title: Airbnb’s next big fix: Company testing new feature; aims to solve one major guest hassle
content: Airbnb and Instacart are piloting a new "kitchen stocking" service for select US rentals. Guests can order groceries via the Airbnb app up to three weeks before arrival, with hosts stocking the items before check-in. This initiative aims to ease a common host pain point and is part of Airbnb's broader push into services.

title: IPL: Mumbai Indians confirm Shardul Thakur's trade from LSG
content: Shardul Thakur is set to join Mumbai Indians for the 2026 IPL season, with the franchise officially confirming the trade from Lucknow Super Giants. This move marks Thakur's seventh IPL team. The announcement comes ahead of the player retention and release announcements scheduled for Saturday. Mumbai Indians will become the seventh IPL franchise that Shardul has represented.

title: Yunus powergrab? B'desh to hold referendum in Feb; what is July Charter?
content: Bangladesh's interim chief adviser Muhammad Yunus announced a national referendum on the "July Charter" for state reform will be held alongside parliamentary elections in February 2026. The charter, born from a student uprising, proposes significant institutional changes. This move occurs amidst heightened political tensions following former Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina's trial.

title: Dhoni or Kohli? Harmanpreet Kaur picks her favourite, crowd goes berserk - watch
content: Indian captain Harmanpreet Kaur, fresh off leading India to their maiden ICC Women's Cricket World Cup title, revealed MS Dhoni as her favourite cricketer over Virat Kohli. Speaking to students, she also expressed her admiration for Virender Sehwag and pride in the growing recognition of women's cricket. India’s journey to the title was challenging.

title: Vibe coding: Meta’s AI chief's advice for teens; 'spend time on this skill'
content: Meta's Chief AI Officer Alexandr Wang urges teenagers to master AI tools, comparing the current era to the dawn of personal computing. He advises dedicating thousands of hours to 'vibe-coding' – hands-on experimentation with AI – to gain a significant advantage in the future economy, much like early programmers did.

title: Asmongold sparks controversy as Trump faces new pressure over Epstein files
content: Zach Hoyt, known as Asmongold, spoke about pressure on Donald Trump to release Epstein documents. He suggested releasing files would bring clarity. Asmongold noted that hiding information fuels public doubt. His comments highlight how online personalities engage in national discussions. The debate over these files now reaches beyond political circles.

title: Employee skips meeting during leave: Boss disappointed; sparks debate on work culture
content: An Indian employee's resignation after being asked to attend a meeting on approved leave sparked widespread discussion.  This incident highlights a growing trend of work encroaching on personal time, with many professionals feeling pressured to be constantly available.  The article explores the toll of overcommitment culture and the emerging demand for better work-life balance and mutual respect.

title: 'Not every Kashmiri is a terrorist': J&K CM reacts to Delhi car blast probe
content: Jammu and Kashmir Chief Minister Omar Abdullah asserted that not all residents of the region are terrorists, following the Red Fort car blast probe widening to Kashmir. The investigation revealed a Turkiye-based handler, codenamed Ukasa, directed the module, which included professionals like doctors and a cleric who allegedly radicalized students.

title: Hack of the day: RBI UDGAM: How to find unclaimed money in your family
content: Discover unclaimed money in your family's name through the RBI's UDGAM portal. Simply use basic details like name and date of birth to search across numerous banks. If a match surfaces, reclaim your funds by visiting the bank with necessary documents. This initiative helps reunite individuals with forgotten deposits, ensuring rightful owners can access their money.

title: Delhi blast: 3rd terror car found; bomb squad at Al-Falah University
content: Investigators discovered a Maruti Suzuki Brezza near Al Falah University as part of the Delhi blast probe. Security sources revealed the bomber, Umar Un Nabi, planned a multi-vehicle IED attack, with three vehicles acquired for the operation. The plot, originating in Turkey, also targeted locations beyond Delhi, including Ayodhya.

title: Happy Children’s Day 2025: Best wishes, messages, quotes and images
content: Children's Day, celebrated annually on November 14th, honors the joy, curiosity, and love children bring. This year, in 2025, the occasion serves as a reminder to cherish childhood and nurture young dreams. The article offers heartfelt wishes and messages to celebrate every child's uniqueness and the special spirit of this day.

title: Red Fort blast probe: Dr Adil’s Srinagar-Delhi flight traced; ticket recovered
content: A flight ticket found in Saharanpur links Dr. Adil Ahmad, arrested last week, to a Srinagar-Delhi trip just before the Red Fort blast. The Jammu and Kashmir native, a qualified doctor, is under scrutiny for potential ties to terror outfits like Jaish-e-Mohammed. Investigators are probing his movements and contacts in Delhi.

title: Ishan Kishan to Mumbai Indians? Ex-India player’s bold statement stirs fans
content: Ishan Kishan's IPL 2025 campaign saw a strong start but a subsequent dip in form for Sunrisers Hyderabad. Former India cricketer Mohammad Kaif suggests Kishan's struggles stem from batting at number three, advocating for a return to Mumbai Indians where he can open. This move, Kaif believes, would benefit both the player and MI.

title: IPL: Top 10 players who might be released; 2026 retention deadline inches closer
content: IPL 2026 retention deadline approaches, with teams finalizing squads by November 15. A blockbuster trade involving Sanju Samson, Ravindra Jadeja, and Sam Curran has already been reported. Several high-profile players, including Mohammed Shami, Venkatesh Iyer, and Deepak Chahar, are among the top 10 potentially facing release due to form, injury, or cost.

title: 'Will call it blast': Cong slams Centre over delay in 'terror' tag; seeks all-party meet
content: Congress leader Pawan Khera has criticized the government for its delayed response to the Delhi car blast near Red Fort, questioning national security and intelligence failures. He highlighted the 48-hour delay in classifying the incident as a terrorist act, which claimed 13 lives. Khera urged an All-Party Meeting to address security concerns, drawing parallels to the 2001 Parliament attack and emphasizing the need for accountability.

title: Codename 'Ukasa': Turkiye handler directed Delhi terror module; how bomber's 2022 trip became key
content: A Turkiye-based handler, codenamed Ukasa, allegedly directed a terror module led by Al-Falah University professor Umar Un Nabi in a plot hatched in 2022. The group, linked to JeM and AGuH, planned spectacular attacks in India, including at Red Fort and Ayodhya, using vehicle-borne IEDs and explosives.

title: Delhi blast: AAP claims 'new plaster, costume' for victim before PM visit; BJP fumes
content: BJP Delhi refuted AAP's claims of fabricating Prime Minister Modi and Chief Minister Gupta meeting the same patient in different conditions. BJP clarified that the CM met the patient immediately after the incident, while the PM visited after the patient had received treatment, calling AAP's allegations 'dirty politics'.

title: Matthew and Brady Tkachuk launch ‘Wingmen’ podcast, join NHL trend
content: NHL stars Matthew and Brady Tkachuk have launched their new podcast, 'Wingmen,' in partnership with Wave Sports & Entertainment. The weekly show promises candid off-ice stories and behind-the-scenes insights from two of the league's most prominent personalities. This initiative aims to provide a much-needed player-driven platform for fans to connect with the sport's stars.

title: Runs, rhythm and form: Cheteshwar Pujara's 'age' warning for Rohit, Virat
content: Former India cricketer Cheteshwar Pujara believes every bilateral series is crucial for veterans Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma as they target the 2027 ODI World Cup. Playing exclusively in ODIs presents challenges in maintaining form during breaks, making consistent performance vital for their continued selection and success. Kohli and Rohit, recently played in the ODI series in Australia,.

title: CISCE releases timetable for ICSE and ISC exams: Check schedule
content: The CISCE has announced the 2026 board exam timetables for ICSE and ISC students. Class 12 exams commence February 12, with Class 10 starting February 17. Over 4 lakh students will participate across numerous subjects. The detailed schedules offer ample preparation time, with results anticipated in April-May 2026. Students are urged to arrive early and utilize reading time effectively.

title: Arjun Tendulkar likely to get new home; Shardul Thakur set for Mumbai Indians move
content: Shardul Thakur is reportedly set for a Mumbai Indians homecoming in the upcoming IPL season, with Lucknow Super Giants in advanced talks for a deal. Simultaneously, Arjun Tendulkar is also nearing a move away from Mumbai Indians to LSG. Both transfers are expected to be straight, all-cash deals, finalized before the BCCI's official announcement.

title: Watch: Botswana hands over 8 cheetahs to President Droupadi Murmu; India's count up to 35
content: Botswana has gifted eight cheetahs to India, bolstering the nation's ambitious Project Cheetah. President Droupadi Murmu accepted the animals, a mix of adults and sub-adults, at Mokolodi Nature Reserve. These majestic cats will soon join others at Kuno National Park, aiding the restoration of the species in its historic Indian homeland. This initiative underscores a shared commitment to wildlife conservation.

title: 'He'll be perfect for them': Ex-CSK batter names surprise star to solve GT's troubles
content: Former CSK batter Anirudha Srikkanth suggests that this KKR batter could solve Gujarat Titans' middle-order woes for IPL 2026. Despite a tough 2025, the batter's past success makes him an ideal No. 4. This move addresses GT's over-reliance on their top order, a concern also noted by Matthew Hayden, as the team eyes key auction adjustments.

title: ISI-Pak terror module busted in Punjab: Grenade attack foiled; 10 held
content: Ludhiana Police have apprehended ten individuals linked to an ISI-backed grenade attack plot targeting a crowded Punjab locale. Investigations reveal foreign handlers in Pakistan, with coordination routed through three operatives in Malaysia for grenade delivery. This operation aims to disrupt cross-border terror networks and maintain state peace, thwarting a significant threat.

title: Gold price today: Yellow metal shines; check 24K, 22K city wise rates
content: Gold and silver prices surged on Thursday, buoyed by positive global sentiment and renewed safe-haven demand following the US government shutdown's end. Both precious metals saw significant gains on the MCX and in international markets. Analysts point to increased investor confidence in potential Federal Reserve easing and the US designating metals as critical as drivers for this rally.

title: Migraine is world’s second-most disabling condition, not just a bad headache
content: Migraine, a debilitating neurological disorder affecting over a billion globally, is far more than a headache. It involves complex brain changes, leading to intense pain and sensory hypersensitivity. Triggers vary, but understanding them and adopting preventive strategies like lifestyle changes and new therapies can significantly reduce attack frequency and improve lives.

title: Stephen A Smith sparks ESPN debate amid gaming app lawsuit probe
content: ESPN has reportedly asked several personalities to stop promoting Papaya Gaming. This action follows a lawsuit against the company. However, Stephen A. Smith's own promotion of the same game has not been affected. Other ESPN names like Mina Kimes have acknowledged the situation. This has sparked debate about fairness in sports media.

title: MS Dhoni's IPL 2026 plans: Gym, swimming, 2 hrs of power-hitting - 'Just Mahi things'
content: MS Dhoni is training rigorously in Ranchi to stay match-ready for IPL 2026. The 44-year-old spends nearly five hours daily at the JSCA Stadium — gym, nets, and swimming. Despite CSK’s poor IPL 2025 campaign, CEO Kasi Viswanathan has all but confirmed that Dhoni isn’t retiring, even as Sanju Samson is set to join the squad

title: Josh Allen’s wife Hailee Steinfeld supports co-star Miles Caton as Sinners scores Grammy nods
content: Hailee Steinfeld is celebrating a significant week. Her film Sinners received multiple Grammy nominations. This marks a new career achievement for the actress and singer. Steinfeld also discussed her growing enjoyment of golf. She shared her thoughts on the sport in her newsletter. Steinfeld finds the game fun and relaxing. She encourages others to embrace golf's enjoyable aspects.

title: No major impact of Trump tariffs? Moody’s says India to be fastest growing major economy
content: India will be the fastest growing major global economy, with Moody's forecasting a strong 6.5% expansion through 2027. This resilience comes despite US tariffs, as Indian exporters successfully diversify markets.

title: Kalyani Priyadarshan on her biggest lesson from father Priyadarshan: 'I will never allow anyone to call me lazy'
content: In the wake of 'Lokah: Chapter 1- Chandra's' sensational success, Kalyani Priyadarshan reflects on the invaluable lessons imparted by her father, renowned filmmaker Priyadarshan. She recounts how his relentless pursuit of excellence persisting through health challenges ignited her passion and discipline in the industry.His next film is going to be Bhoot Bangla with Akshay Kumar, Tabu and Paresh Rawal.

title: 'No job is safe anymore,' shares laid-off Amazon employee: 6 ways to future-proof your career in an age of AI layoffs
content: Amazon's job cuts highlight a new reality for professionals.  Artificial intelligence is reshaping industries, making even skilled roles vulnerable.  To thrive, workers must embrace change, develop uniquely human skills like empathy and creativity, and build strong professional networks.  Continuous learning and staying informed about technological shifts are crucial for career survival and growth in this evolving landscape.

title: IND vs SA: 'Not many bowlers ...' - Captain Gill breaks silence on Shami's omission
content: Captain Shubman Gill admitted leaving out Mohammad Shami for the South Africa Test series was a tough call, praising the veteran's class despite selecting a younger pace attack. Gill also discussed managing his captaincy workload across formats, acknowledging the mental challenge. He stressed India must be at their best against the strong South African side in the crucial WTC race.

title: Dharmendra has a 100 acre farmhouse where he spends time with first wife
content: Veteran actor Dharmendra finds solace and joy at his sprawling 100-acre farmhouse, a peaceful retreat far from Mumbai's hustle. Embracing simplicity, he cultivates fruits, vegetables, and rice, cherishing his deep connection to farming. This natural haven, where he often spends time with his wife Prakash Kaur, reflects his lifelong love for the outdoors and the land.

title: Olympic legend Surya Bonaly loses all her medals to Las Vegas thieves while caring for her cancer-stricken mother
content: Olympic figure skater Surya Bonaly is devastated after thieves stole all her career medals while she was in Minnesota caring for her mother, who is also battling cancer. The burglary at her Las Vegas home revealed broken windows and destroyed security cameras, with surveillance footage indicating multiple individuals were involved over several days.

title: Bloodshed at Maharashtra wedding: Groom stabbed on stage; drone captures assault
content: A wedding in Amravati turned violent when a man, identified as Raghav alias Ragho Jitendra Bakshi, stabbed groom Sujal Samudre (22) on stage. The shocking incident, captured by a drone, left guests in panic. While the groom is stable, the motive is suspected to be a dispute over DJ payment, leading to retaliatory vandalism at the accused's home.

content: the blackout affects ABC, the ESPN networks, the Disney-branded channels, Freeform, the FX networks and the Xfinity network . the conflict affects the channel's ability to carry Disney programming . if you don't have cable access, you can get instant access to ESPN content through a variety of services including Cox, Dish, DirecTV, Fios, Fubo, Hulu + Live TV, Mediacom, Optimum, Sling, Spectrum TV and

title: Women's Power Rankings: The 16 best teams so far
content: the first edition of ESPN's women's college basketball Power Rankings for 2025-26 . the top four teams in our initial rankings are the programs that went to the Final Four last season . of that group, UCLA has the most impressive victory so far: 73-59 over fellow top-10 team Oklahoma on Monday .

title: 🏈 Bottom 10: BYU makes dreaded appearance!
content: the red Raiders take over deep in BYU territory after a muffed punt by Parker Kingston . "It's Getting Real in the Whole Foods parking lot," DJ Spider Here at Bottom 10 Headquarters . the calendar hangs on the front of our refrigerator .

title: Men's Power Rankings: Biggest early-season risers
content: 81 points between the two proving that their lack of perimeter shooting isn't much of a factor . the Crimson Tide had elite guards, but it wasn't clear whether they had the frontcourt balance to make another deep run in March .

title: What we’re hearing entering Week 11: Kyler Murray’s future, Giants’ next steps, more
content: Jeremy Fowler and Dan Graziano have been making calls to sources around the league for the latest news and buzz on key situations . they also checked in on Kyler Murray 's future and what might happen with the Cardinals' quarterback situation in the offseason .

title: Five things that have made Patriots QB Drake Maye an MVP favorite
content: new England Patriots quarterback Drake Maye has made plenty of highlight-reel plays this season . he is the favorite to win the NFL's Most Valuable Player Award . maye has called the play 11 times this season for minus-13 yar .

title: Reranking all 68 Power 4 QBs: Who rose and who fell after two months
content: a new app lets you watch your favorite events in the newly enhanced ESPN App . the new app will help you figure out who the best quarterbacks will be in a given season . it's a good idea of this year's hierarchy with just three regular-season Saturdays to go .

title: UWCL talking points: What's wrong with Arsenal? Was Earps upstaged?
content: UEFA women's champions league (UWCL) saw more exciting matchups . OL Lyonnes beat VfL Wolfsburg 3-1, real madrid thrashed st. pölten 6-0 . the match saw a 3-2 comeback win over arsenal and a 1-1 draw .

title: Week 12 preview: A wide-open ACC title race, key matchups and more
content: a slew of teams are teetering on a thin line between being in or out . this week features four ranked matchups that could shift the playoff picture dramatically . no. 9 Notre Dame's margin for error is zero as it faces a 7-2 Pittsburgh team .
